briefTitle: A Trial Comparing the PICOPREP Tailored Dosing Schedule to the PICOPREP Day-before Dosing Schedule for Colon Cleansing in Preparation for Colonoscopy
officialTitle: A Randomised, Assessor-blinded, Multi-centre Trial Comparing the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of the PICOPREP Tailored Dosing Schedule to the PICOPREP Day-before Dosing Schedule for Colon Cleansing in Preparation for Colonoscopy
summary: This was a phase 3, randomised, assessor-blinded, multi-centre trial comparing the efficacy, safety and tolerability of a PICOPREP tailored dosing schedule to the PICOPREP day-before dosing schedule for colon cleansing in preparation for colonoscopy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Overall Colon Cleansing Procedure (ITT) Measured by the Total Ottawa Scale
